MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD11 postcode area of Duns. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 11.14am following reports of fault on the overhead line network near the Radio Mast at Hardens Hill and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.29am on the 4th of February 2021.
